body_html: FWIW I tried option 1 from @KashiErez - Installing cuda on non-gpu machines as well. It turns out that while I can in fact install cuda on a machine with no GPUs, nvidia-docker dies with "unknown error". My guess is that cuda relies on an actual GPU being present in order to work correctly. Looks like virtualenv is the way to go.
